name: Total Diet & Meal Replacements Europe
goal: Total Diet & Meal Replacements Europe (formerly known as the European Very Low Calorie Diet Industry Group) is the European trade body for manufacturers and distributors of total diet replacement and meal replacement products which provide weight loss programmes for the very overweight and obese. Members of the Group currently operate predominantly in the Netherlands, Sweden, Finland, the Czech Republic, the United Kingdom, Denmark, Ireland, Cyprus, Greece and Poland.
interests: Consumers, Food Safety, Public Health, Single market
euInitiatives:
Nutrition and Health Claims Regulation (submissions)
Food Information to Consumers Regulation
Delegated Act on the Compositional Criteria for Total Diet Replacements for Weight Control
Regulation on food intended for infants and
young children, food for special medical purposes, and total diet replacement for weight control
Additives regulation and authorisation
Risk assessment
